data.title: Metrikus
data.description: Metrikus is a platform that helps to make buildings more efficient. Implemented at Met Office HQ, [in the news](https://www.twinfm.com/article/monitoring-energy-usage-at-met-office-hq)

data.title: Buildings IOT
data.description: We develop and deploy cloud-based building analytics software, we implement complex Integrated Building Management Systems, we design and install controls systems, we maintain building assets and we provide IT managed services.

data.title: Passive Logic
data.description: Sensors and actuators with a software platform that automates the whole building life cycle. [Keyframe capital](https://www.keyframecapital.com/) has invested in them

data.title: Amber
data.description: discreet solid-state board for power control. Raised $8.5M in Feb 2021, from [crunchbase](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/amber-series-b-funding/)

data.title: eo charging
data.description: ev charging. Found on [uktn post](https://www.uktech.news/news/these-uk-battery-tech-ev-charging-startups-are-accelerating-shift-to-cleaner-energy-future-in-2021-20210208): The most lit battery tech startups in UK to follow in 2021, feb 21

data.title: pod point
data.description: Pod point, formed in 2009, have manufactured and sold over 96,000 charging points across the UK and Norway. [In the news, May 21](https://www.edie.net/news/8/In-action--Exploring-Skanska-electric-vehicle-charging-retrofit/): Skanska worked with EDF-owned chargepoint provider Pod Point to install EV chargers at its Hertfordshire office in Maple Cross.

data.title: Instavolt
data.description: Backed by a £12m equity investment by private equity firm Zouk Capital, Instavolt is on track to be the largest owner-operator of rapid DC charging stations in the UK .

data.title: Project EV
data.description: smart AC / DC EV chargers both domestic and industrial, has partnered with software platform [Electric Miles](https://www.electricmiles.io/) to deploy a network of chargers providing grid flexibility

data.title: Wallbox
data.description: Barcelona based Wallbox is a smart charging company on a mission to liberate the world from fossil fuels. Raised €33M in Feb 2021, from [Techcrunch](https://www.finsmes.com/2021/02/wallbox-raises-e33m-in-funding.html)

data.title: Volta
data.description: developer of a network of electric vehicle charging stations that monetize using advertising. Raised $125M in Feb 2021, from [Techcrunch](https://techcrunch.com/2021/01/19/ad-supported-ev-charging-network-developer-volta-raises-125-million/)

data.title: Connected Kerb
data.description: Our smart cities platform integrates both power and data at kerbside to support electric and autonomous vehicles, and the application of advanced IoT technologies.

data.title: Green Frog Power
data.description: Green Frog Power builds and operates power stations. We deliver power into the UK’s network when it is most needed.

data.title: Fuergy
data.description: Fuergy's goal is to shift from conventional electricity consumers to innovative green power prosumers who produce, consume and share energy effectively. Based in Slovenia

data.title: BMZ
data.description: The BMZ Group is a leader in the entire product life cycle of cross-industry lithium-ion battery systems.

data.title: Faradion
data.description: UK based Faradion was founded in 2011 to develop sodium-ion technology and to bring it to market. Ambani's [RIL](https://www.ril.com/) has bought it for £100M in Dec 2021, [in the news](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/ril-buys-uk-hi-tech-battery-co-faradion-for-its-10-billion-new-energy-empire/articleshow/88615682.cms)

data.title: TESVolt
data.description: TESVOLT's award-winning battery management system ensures that commercial and industrial storage systems pay for themselves within just a few years. In March 21, [Tesvolt launches offer all-in-one and ‘plug-and-play’](https://www.energy-storage.news/news/commercial-and-utility-battery-storage-launches-offer-all-in-one-and-plug-a) options

data.title: Dhybrid
data.description: Microgrid developers, Dhybrid main goal is to maximize the effectiveness of energy conversion. In [June 21](https://www.energy-storage.news/news/dhybrid-installs-microgrids-on-26-maldivian-islands-to-reduce-diesel-relian) they installed microgrids on 26 Maldivian islands to reduce diesel reliance

data.title: EVO Energy
data.description: We turn blue chip companies and SMEs’ sites into ecosystems of sustainable energy through rooftop solar panels, battery storage, solar carports and EV charging stations. check their [PPA](ttps://www.evoenergy.co.uk/services/power-purchase-agreement/) (min 200 panels / 40kwp, recommend epc certificate)

data.title: Form Energy
data.description: developing a new kind of battery that would eliminate the need for coal and gas entirely, and allow for a 100% renewable, carbon free grid.

data.title: StorTera
data.description: Our key development is the SLIQ single liquid flow battery, which uses StorTera engineered graphite-sulphur battery chemistry and only a single tank of innovative catholyte liquid.

data.title: Glow
data.description: Smart energy indicator glows to show real-time energy usage. Magneto-resistive technology wirelessly measures power usage

data.title: Best Energy
data.description: Best wants To optimise buildings globally, by harnessing the power of the Internet of Things (IoT), Big Data and Artificial Intelligence (AI). To forge a built environment that is more energy-efficient, more sustainable and more pleasing to work and live in.

data.title: IoT Systems Group
data.description: IoT Systems Group is a Company passionate about delivering the best in Industry 4.0 technology to the UK and MENA markets.

data.title: Open Sensors
data.description: OpenSensors provides a smart Building Management System with sensors and analytics tools analyse effective use of your space.

data.title: MyEnergi
data.description: MyEnergi  developing green products for home and business, recently awarded a BEIS contract for domestic DSR [source: the energyst](https://theenergyst.com/domestic-demand-side-response-8-6m-competition-winners-announced/)

data.title: Home Connect
data.description: Home Connect  is the iot very proprietary platform by Bosch, device management and optimisation with a set of selected partners

data.title: Hive
data.description: Hive  smart home device range, started with thermostat, bought by Centrica / British Gas

data.title: Nest
data.description: Nest  notoriously bought by Google, started as thermostat only, progressively expanded to smart home

data.title: Develco
data.description: Develco  Denmark based, gateway, controlled socket, relays, pass through, sensors. All Zigbee connected, quite amazing

data.title: Lightwave rf
data.description: Lightwave rf  controlled and connected power sockets, switches, sensors, radiator valves. They claim to do energy monitoring, but haven't found anything on website.

data.title: Ecopilot
data.description: Improve the working environment, improve productivity – Our clients/customers describe Ecopilot® and as an Artificial Intelligence that enables our various systems to collaborate, rather than constantly working against each other.

data.title: Netatmo
data.description: Netatmo  smart thermostat, air quality monitor, smoke detector, radiator valves, indoor / outdoor camera

data.title: Gridduck
data.description: Gridduck  UK based cloud energy management platform with devices developed on top of Develco (see above). Listed for winning 360k in funding for gamification of EV charging in the south-korea collaboration, [link](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/funding-for-innovative-smart-energy-systems) founder and CEO is [Gregor](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gregor-hoefter-8bb77/)

data.title: Asema
data.description: Asema  is a smart-energy iot platform with sensors and dashboards, not sure it's on the market already. They also have an [open API](http://www.smart-api.io/)

data.title: Innovelec
data.description: Innovelec  custom design and implementation of IoT solutions mainly in UK

data.title: Tridium
data.description: Tridium  owned by Honeywell International deleoping IoT for business applications, creators of the Niagara framework that also has a [marketplace](https://www.niagaramarketplace.com/marketplace_home)

data.title: Syscom
data.description: Syscom  is a Centrica company that creates tailored and custom-made solutions in the engineering, software, commissioning and maintenance of Building Energy Management Systems. Manufacturer of a [wireless meter](https://syscombms.com/wireless-metering/)

data.title: Control 4
data.description: Control 4  is one of the leading home automation systems with plenty of upscale different devices. Quite new to energy efficiency though, worth [a check](https://www.control4.com/blog/456/energyefficient-home-controls-lighting-and-solar-with-a-hightech-twist)

data.title: 75f
data.description: 75f  is a IoT smart HVAC solution makes commercial buildings more comfortable and energy efficient. Funded by [breakthrough energy ventures](https://www.gatesnotes.com/Energy/Buildings-are-good-for-people-and-bad-for-the-climate)

data.title: EcoSync Energy
data.description: EcoSync Energy  have created a cloud-based platform for existing building technologies like the room booking system and heating control to synchronise and communicate so as to provide heating for occupied areas only.

data.title: Guru Systems
data.description: Guru Systems  improves the performance of heat networks, their technology is for people who want to deliver and operate heat networks

data.title: Switchee
data.description: Switchee

data.title: Tado
data.description: Tado  Germany rising, mentioned in the Reuters article (see below)

data.title: Ecobee
data.description: Ecobee  canada based, with v. interesting “donate your data” program, backed by [energy impact partners](https://www.energyimpactpartners.com/)

data.title: kiwipower
data.description: Kiwi Power’s distributed energy platform simply and reliably unlocks flexibility from Distributed Energy Resources (DERs) to maximise their value.

data.title: Power X
data.description: PowerX’s suite of smart home solutions provides a unified view of all energy, devices and water outlets running in your home through one, easy-to-use app. Received $4M in April 21 from Spring Tide, Antler and others. [In the news](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/powerx-supercharges-home-utilities-with-4m-seed-round/)

data.title: efergy
data.description: efergy  wire clamps, controlled sockets, webapp

data.title: sense
data.description: sense  wire clamps, installed in the fuse box

data.title: Geo together
data.description: Geo (green energy options) together: wire clamps, controlled sockets, thermostats, solar (mentioned in the solar/battery section by Ikea, indicates when to switch on/off appliances), consumer + business. Awarded phase 2 of UK gov [2020 SENS competition](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/smart-energy-savings-sens-competition)

data.title: smappee
data.description: smappee  wire clamps, webapp, claims to disaggregate by appliance

data.title: neur.io
data.description: neur.io  wire clamps, webapp, solar

data.title: Open energy monitor
data.description: Open energy monitor  Open source home energy / solar / heat pump / EV charging monitor with their CMS [emocms](https://emoncms.org/)

data.title: rialtocomfort
data.description: rialtocomfort  wire clamps, thermostats, webapp

data.title: watty
data.description: watty  Monitor, mainly a mobile app? Based in Sweden, Not sure how it works

data.title: voltaware
data.description: Energy monitor with sensors

data.title: Veris
data.description: Veris

data.title: lechacal for Raspberry pi
data.description: lechacal for Raspberry pi

data.title: Gewiss
data.description: Gewiss  Zigbee series

data.title: Bega
data.description: Bega  16A Zigbee relay

data.title: Pikkerton
data.description: Pikkerton  Zigbee relay

data.title: google images
data.description: Search  google images  for Zigbee din relay there are tons!

data.title: Carbon Neutral Energy
data.description: Carbon Neutral Energy have developed a Unique Mobile Battery Storage Solution to store & deliver green electric power. CNE has embarked on [a £300m fund-raise](https://dailybusinessgroup.co.uk/2021/02/power-firm-cne-plans-300m-cash-raise-and-200-jobs/) and started expanding to the United States, two months after officially launching in the UK, [in the news May 21](https://solarbuildermag.com/news/carbon-neutral-energys-mobile-battery-storage-concept-coming-to-the-united-states/)

data.title: Electriq Power
data.description: Electriq Power is a developer of intelligent and integrated home energy storage, management, and monitoring solutions, their battery systems can be found in customers’ homes and small businesses. In [April 21](https://www.energyglobal.com/energy-storage/28042021/electriq-and-cuc-to-trial-residential-battery-storage-programme/) they started to trial residential battery storage programme with Caribbean Utilities Company

data.title: VoltStorage
data.description: Vanadium Redox Flow Batteries for home and optimisation of solar. Recently (July 2020) [raised eur6M](https://sifted.eu/articles/voltstorage-tesla-powerwall-alternative/) in funding

data.title: eCamion
data.description: eCamion  was founded on the principle of providing green energy to support the future needs of a growing population and offering new solutions for Utilities, Automotive, Mining, Renewables and Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure.

data.title: Pivot Power
data.description: Pivot Power  London + Oxford based big battery storage projects for EV charging and large residential / commercial developments connected directly to the transmission system.

data.title: Blue planet energy
data.description: Blue planet energy  Hawaii based storage for residential

data.title: Connected Energy
data.description: Connected Energy , based in Newcastle, UK. Recycling EV batteries but for commercial and industrial

data.title: Reluce
data.description: Reluce [li-ion capacitors](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithium-ion_capacitor) 120kW to 2.5MW

data.title: PowerVault
data.description: PowerVault  London based, batteries for residential, recycling EV batteries

data.title: Relectrify
data.description: Radically rethinking battery management system and inverter technology for long-life, low-cost battery storage

data.title: Box of Energy
data.description: The company was founded in Gothenburg, Sweden, in 2014 with the concept of using 2nd life electric car batteries to create a product that covers all needs for energy storage.

data.title: FIAMM
data.description: FIAMM  Italian battery company, part of the Hitachi group, historically for vehicles, now shifting towards other markets

data.title: PowerFlow
data.description: PowerFlow

data.title: Volts battery
data.description: Volts battery , Finland based for residential

data.title: Moixa
data.description: Moixa  UK’s leading smart battery company, that offers integrated hardware and GridShare™ software, for renewable energy management.

data.title: Sonnen
data.description: Sonnen  German company, been recently (Feb 19) bought by Shell [in the news](https://edition.cnn.com/2019/02/15/tech/shell-sonnen-home-batteries/index.html)

data.title: Tesla powerwall
data.description: Tesla powerwall

data.title: Power Blox
data.description: Power Blox  based in Zurich, working on projects for Africa / developing countries, CTO and Co-Founder is [Alessandro Medici](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alessandro-medici-90a91030/)

data.title: Nant energy
data.description: Nant energy  **Zinc batteries** aiming 100$/kwh has been recently featured in [NY times](https://www.nytimes.com/2018/09/26/business/energy-environment/zinc-battery-solar-power.html)

data.title: PowerTech Systems
data.description: PowerTech Systems  is a French company focussed on Lithium-Ion storage market and associated technologies. Specialized in design and engineering high performance Lithium batteries (> 1KW) covering a large application spectrum

data.title: Electrovaya
data.description: Electrovaya  was founded in 1996 as a research and development company focused on Lithium ion technologies and manufacturing processes. In 2000, the company was listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX:EFL) and over the years has delivered projects for specialized applications in the aerospace, automotive and personal electronics segments.

data.title: Northvolt
data.description: Northvolt, Stockholm based.[Raised 2.7B in June 2021](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/briefing-6-9-21/). [Raised 600M in Sep 2020](https://www.electrive.com/2020/09/29/northvolt-raises-600-million-from-investors/) to expand its production and recycling capacity and research and development activities.

data.title: RedT
data.description: RedT  vanadium flow batteries for industrial & commercial use

data.title: Hycube
data.description: Hycube  based in Germany, residential and commercial

data.title: Mounting systems
data.description: Berlin based, innovative installation systems for photovoltaic systems to simplify the work routine of installers, project planners and wholesalers

data.title: Custom Solar
data.description: Custom Solar designs, installs and maintains world-class solar systems for corporations and public sector institutions. Deployed thousands of panels at [Lakeside North Harbour in Portsmouth](https://www.portsmouth.co.uk/news/environment/thousands-of-solar-panels-to-be-installed-at-lakeside-north-harbour-in-portsmouth-3176952)

data.title: Anesco
data.description: Designed and built 103 solar farms in the UK totalling 600MW. Market leader in the UK battery storage market. Managing and monitoring 1GW of clean energy across 22,500 renewable assets.

data.title: Arinna Solar
data.description: The Mission of Arinna Solar is to originate, develop, design, finance, build, own and operate utility scale solar projects internationally. London based

data.title: Lightsource
data.description: Lightsource focuses on development and management of solar energy projects. Our projects generate competitively-priced, reliable and sustainable energy for businesses and communities. In [June 21](https://renews.biz/70594/lightsource-labs-partners-on-uk-pv-storage-solution/) partnered with [Pure Planet](https://purepla.net/) to provide their VPP solution

data.title: BBoxx
data.description: BBOXX designs, manufactures, and distributes plug and play solar systems. It also offers pay-as-you-go solar power. BBoxx hardly can be defined a PV or a battery company, they provide a solar + battery + monitoring solution for developing countries, London based

data.title: sma
data.description: sma  german company, with [data management platform](https://www.sma.de/en/products/monitoring-control/data-manager-m.html)

data.title: polysolar
data.description: polysolar

data.title: ikea
data.description: ikea

data.title: solar edge
data.description: Established in 2006, listed on NASDAQ since 2015, SolarEdge developed the DC optimized inverter solution that changed the way power is harvested and managed in photovoltaic (PV) systems.

data.title: solar century
data.description: solar century has been acquired by [statkraft](https://www.statkraft.com/)

data.title: enphase
data.description: enphase  (US)

data.title: sunpower
data.description: sunpower  (US)

data.title: bticino photovoltaic
data.description: bticino photovoltaic

data.title: Calibrant Energy
data.description: Total lifecycle management of the project with a partner that can assume responsibility of servicing, maintenance, and the operation of assets over the course of the contract lifetime. Established in 2020 by Macquarie’s Green Investment Group, Siemens Smart Infrastructure and Siemens Financial Services.

data.title: Catalyze Energy
data.description: Catalyze develops, builds, finances, owns, and operates renewable energy assets on C&I real estate, acting as a long-term tenant on your property. How the business model works and who they're backed from [explained on GTM](https://www.greentechmedia.com/articles/read/catalyze-aims-to-remake-commercial-storage-with-software-platform-and-gobs-of-capital)

data.title: S&C
data.description: They build hardware + software and provide consultancy services for implementation of microgrids, quite big US based
